name: Agriculture allocation as a % of total expenditure
description: The proportion of total local government expenditure that is allocated to the agriculture sector.

name: Decent standard of living score
description: Decent standard of living score (higher is better).

description: Primary education donor spending per child.

name: Donor funds
description: The proportion of local government revenue that is funded through donor funding, by district.

description: The proportion of total local government expenditure that is allocated to the education sector, by district.

name: Primary health spending per person
description: Local government health spending, per person.

name: Health allocation as a % of total expenditure
description: The proportion of total local government expenditure that is allocated to the health sector.

name: Primary leaving exam performance index
description: % of pupils passing the primary education leaving exam.

name: Locally raised revenues
description: The proportion of local government revenue that is locally generated, through collection of fees, fines and other local taxation, by district.
